practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
People in Portland, Oregon, who face complicated legal issues, involving bankruptcy and personal injury often require the assistance of a dedicated attorney. At the law offices of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys, our practice is focused on representing those who are struggling with creditor harassment, repossession threats, license suspension, rebuilding credit and other financial issues. We have over 30 years of experience dealing with bankruptcy issues, from Chapter 13 and Chapter 7 to Chapter 11, Chapter 12 and consumer protection.

In addition to bankruptcy matters, our law offices help people throughout Oregon and the Tri-County area of Washington who have suffered injuries as a result of another party's negligence. During a free initial consultation, we listen to the details of the matter at hand. We handle motor vehicle accidents, truck collisions, pedestrian accidents, wrongful death, birth injuries and traumatic brain damage. We work hard to partner with our clients and build a strong case that will maximize their outcome.

At the law offices of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys, our attorneys are admitted to practice in Washington State Courts, Oregon State Courts, and the United States District Courts for Eastern and Western Districts of Washington and Oregon. As members of the Washington State Bar Association and other prestigious organizations, we have the knowledge necessary to help our clients when they need it the most. As a convenience to our clients, we also accept credit cards.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
